ai-ja183:1.3_0: Whereas after drinking this fine liquor
ai-ja183:2.1_0: “Having given up (something) poor the low man
ai-ja183:2.2_0: Fed on that becomes drunk, O Leader of Men.
ai-ja183:2.3_0: born in a habit of ethics,
ai-ja183:2.4_0: After drinking (even) the best liquor does not get drunk.”
ai-ja183:3.1_0: Or the third droping of the lotus
